messages.title: Urgent action to tackle climate change
messages.content: A Labour government will take the bold and urgent action needed to tackle the climate emergency. We have committed to a Green New Deal: creating hundreds of thousands of good, green jobs in renewable energy and sustainable industries, while drastically reducing our carbon emissions.

messages.title: Investing in our schools and our NHS
messages.content: Nine years of austerity has had a catastrophic impact on our public services. Only Labour in power will end austerity and fully invest in our schools, hospitals and other public services. We will build a fairer society, putting people before privilege and ensuring no individual or community is left behind.

messages.title: A million new genuinely affordable houses
messages.content: Under the Tories, homelessness has doubled. Social housing waiting lists rise while luxury flats stand empty, and thousands are living in homes unfit for human habitation. Labour will tackle the housing crisis by delivering a million social and affordable homes and cracking down on rogue landlords.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Final say on Brexit put back to the people. Labour will offer the option to remain on the ballot.
Labour will tackle the climate emergency with a Green New Deal.
Labour will scrap prescription charges and train a new generation of GPs.
Labour will build one million new social and genuinely affordable homes.
Labour will invest in more youth workers and community police.

issues.brexitEurope: Final say on Brexit put back to the people. Labour will offer the option to remain on the ballot.
issues.education: Nine years of austerity has had a catastrophic impact on our public services. Only Labour in power will end austerity and fully invest in our schools.
issues.environment: A Labour government will take the bold and urgent action needed to tackle the climate emergency. We have committed to a Green New Deal: creating hundreds of thousands of good, green jobs in renewable energy and sustainable industries, while drastically reducing our carbon emissions.
issues.health: Only Labour in power will end austerity and fully invest in our schools, hospitals and other public services. Labour will scrap prescription charges and train a new generation of GPs.
issues.lawCrime: Labour will invest in more youth workers and community police.

community.content: Under the Tories, homelessness has doubled. Labour will build one million new social and genuinely affordable homes.

leaflet.personalStatement: I have been proud to serve as your MP since 2015. For me, politics is local. Whether it is fighting Brexit, pushing for more funding for our local schools or tackling rising youth violence, I have always taken on campaigns that make a difference to our local community. If re-elected, I will continue to champion our local area, fight to remain in the EU and represent our community's best interests in Parliament.

endorsements.endorsement: The Windrush scandal broke at the time I was struggling to secure student finance for my studies. Vicky identified the root of my troubles and helped me secure my status, apply for citizenship and pay my student fees. Having such a committed, hardworking MP in today's hostile environment has been invaluable.

quotes.text: I've voted against every bad Brexit deal proposed by the Tories, I've fought hard against a no deal Brexit and I'll keep fighting for us to remain in the EU.
